text: U (Muhemmed!) tu ji bona wan ra, serda borya herdu kuren Adem bi rasti bixune. Ewan herdukan; heryeke ji wan goryek dabun. Gorya yeke ji wan herdukan, hatibu lite kirine u gorya ewe mayi ne hatibuye lite kirine. (Ewe ku gorya wi ne hatibuye lite kirine, ji bona wiyi gorya wi hatibuye lite kirine ra) gotiye: “(Ji ber ku gorya te hatiye lite kirine) bi sond! Eze te bikujim.” (Biraye wi ji wi ra aha) gotiye: “Bi rasti Yezdan hey (perestiya) wane yezdanparizi dikin, lite dike.”
